payload.title: Fix task list sorting - sort by lastUpdated before applying limit
payload.description: COMPLETED - Root cause was argument parsing, not missing sorting logic. The sorting by lastUpdated was already implemented correctly in lines 445-457. Fixed index.ts to filter pnpm/npm -- separator. Confirmed --order flag works (asc/desc). All acceptance criteria met: limit 1 returns most recent task, limit N returns N most recent, tests pass. Future: add sorting tests, consider --sort-by flag for other fields.
